ssot__DeviceApplicationTemplate__dlm.name: Device Application Template
ssot__DeviceApplicationTemplate__dlm.description: The Device Application Template DMO represents a reusable standard format for applications to exchange information between devices.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for Device Application Template DMO.

ssot__DeviceApplicationTemplateBodyTxt__.description: The text representation of device application message.

ssot__EngagementAssetNbr__c.description: A user-facing number to identify the engagement asset.

ssot__EngagementAssetTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of engagement asset, for example an email or phone template.

ssot__EngagementMessageTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of engagement message, for example outbound, location entry, or beacon.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__MessageFormatTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of asset or template format, for example a landing page or application alert.

ssot__ParentEngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID for primary engagement asset. This relationship enables engagement asset hierarchies.
